name: 32 Bee-T Engine Test
description:
NOTE: Keyboard input will NOT work if a controller is plugged in. Please disconnect controllers before playing the game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A small 3D action game engine made for the 2021 32-Bit Jam.

It's not really a game, more of a showcase of some of the things built for the engine, including loading zones, pixel-perfect rendering, and a hitbox engine.

Don't forget to keep an eye out for any suspicious bee-havior... :P
